dsOverview.title: Global Monthly Streamflow Time Series

summary.p: Copy of CD - Global Streamflow Time Series, v.1.0 (a global hydro-climatic data network) Michael Dettinger (USGS) and Henry Diaz (CDC) (Journal of Hydrometeorology, I(4), 289-310, August 2000 This set has been included in ds552.1.
